products.title: Bella Blackout Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This moody Dark Teal Blue electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our electric rollers are great for privacy and light control and as there is no need for a cord with this blind, this makes this blind inherently child-safe! 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This lush blue electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2094 Fabric Colour: Dark Teal Blue Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Midnight Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Midnight Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £140.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style both inside and outside your home. 
 
 This Midnight Blue electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  The dark blue shade of this fabric will look stunning when paired with natural and darker wooden tones and will beautifully compliment cool, contemporary shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This dark blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
